content:
# I have successfully inserted 5 coal into the stone furnace, leaving me with 15 coal in my inventory.
# 
# Now, I will check the inventory of the stone furnace to see how many iron plates have been produced so far.

furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace)  # Inspecting the inventory of the stone furnace.
iron_plates = furnace_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0)  # Getting the count of iron plates produced.
print(f"Stone furnace inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Displaying the stone furnace inventory.
